note:
Long haired person who likes old electronics and software. Unsure if Gen X, Millennial or something in-between. Started out on the C64 in 88 but uses Mac since 04.
Runs own business, writes a lot of PHP and generally tries to solve other peoples problems.
Always wants to be nice to everyone, but sometimes fails to think things through.
Often says yes when probably should not have. Uses too many unnecessary words a lot of the time and never knows when to stop.
